sqls.sql: select p.name as 产品名称, oi.PRODUCT_COUNT as 数量, oi.TOTAL_AMT as 金额 from ES_ORDER_ITEM oi left join ES_PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_UC = p.UNIQUE_CODE where oi.ORDER_UC = :ORDER_UC
SELECT UNIQUE_CODE as UNIQUE_CODE$K$H, NAME as 名称,PRICE as 单价, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 FROM ES_PRODUCT
SELECT U.UNIQUE_CODE FROM SYS_USER U, SYS_USERINFO_WX W WHERE U.UNIQUE_CODE = W.UNIQUE_CODE AND W.OPENID = :OPENID
SELECT p.*, f.PATH THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM ES_PRODUCT p left join SYS_FILE_STORE_MAPPING f on p.THUMBNAIL = f.UNIQUE_CODE
SELECT t.NICKNAME 昵称,decode(t.SEX,'1','男','2','女','未知') 性别,t.COUNTRY||t.PROVINCE||t.CITY 位置 FROM SYS_USERINFO_WX t WHERE UNIQUE_CODE = :UNIQUE_CODE
